repairedDockerfile:
# AUTO GENERATED: DO NOT EDIT!
ARG BASE_IMAGE="nvidia/cuda:11.0.3-devel-ubuntu20.04"
FROM ${BASE_IMAGE}

RUN export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive && \
    apt-get -qqy update && \
    apt-get -qqy --no-install-recommends install \
       make build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev \
       libbz2-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev wget \
       curl llvm libncursesw5-dev xz-utils tk-dev \
       libxml2-dev libxmlsec1-dev libffi-dev \
       liblzma-dev && \
    apt-get -qqy --no-install-recommends install ccache git curl && \
    apt-get -qqy --no-install-recommends --allow-change-held-packages \
            --allow-downgrades install 'libnccl2=2.9.*+cuda11.0' 'libnccl-dev=2.9.*+cuda11.0' 'libcutensor1=1.4.*' 'libcutensor-dev=1.4.*' 'libcudnn8=8.2.*+cuda11.4' 'libcudnn8-dev=8.2.*+cuda11.4' && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENV PATH "/usr/lib/ccache:${PATH}"

RUN git clone https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv.git /opt/pyenv
ENV PYENV_ROOT "/opt/pyenv"
ENV PATH "${PYENV_ROOT}/shims:${PYENV_ROOT}/bin:${PATH}"
RUN pyenv install 3.9.6 && \
    pyenv global 3.9.6 && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir -U setuptools pip

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -U 'numpy==1.20.*' 'scipy==1.7.*' 'optuna==2.*' 'cython==0.29.*'
